mapper.update: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS crowd_reward_#{crowd_id} ( reward_id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY, crowd_id INT default #{crowd_id}, reward_title VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, reward_content VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, reward_amount INT NOT NULL, reward_limit INT NOT NULL, reward_left INT NOT NULL, is_deleted BOOL default false )
mapper.select: SELECT reward_id AS rewardId, crowd_id AS crowdId, reward_title AS rewardTitle, reward_content AS rewardContent, reward_amount AS rewardAmount, reward_limit AS rewardLimit, reward_left AS rewardLeft, is_deleted AS isDeleted FROM crowd_reward_#{crowdId}

SELECT reward_id AS rewardId, crowd_id AS crowdId, reward_title AS rewardTitle, reward_content AS rewardContent, reward_amount AS rewardAmount, reward_limit AS rewardLimit, reward_left AS rewardLeft, is_deleted AS isDeleted FROM crowd_reward_#{crowdId} WHERE is_deleted = false

SELECT reward_id AS rewardId, crowd_id AS crowdId, reward_title AS rewardTitle, reward_content AS rewardContent, reward_amount AS rewardAmount, reward_limit AS rewardLimit, reward_left AS rewardLeft, is_deleted AS isDeleted FROM crowd_reward_#{crowdId} WHERE reward_id = #{rewardId}
mapper.insert: INSERT IGNORE INTO crowd_reward_#{crowdId} (reward_id, crowd_id, reward_title, reward_content, reward_amount, reward_limit, reward_left, is_deleted) VALUES (#{rewardId}, #{crowdId}, #{rewardTitle}, #{rewardContent}, #{rewardAmount}, #{rewardLimit}, #{rewardLeft}, #{isDeleted})
